newsitem.title: NEW ZEALAND: New Zealand shares end stronger in optimistic mkt.
newsitem.headline: New Zealand shares end stronger in optimistic mkt.

text.p: * NZ shares close stronger, Telecom leads the way
* Some profit-taking sees market close off its highs
* Market optimistic monetary policy easing drawing closer
"There was very good demand all week after the CPI came out (on Tuesday) and people put a monetary policy easing back into their forecasts," Koller said.
The consumer price inflation data came in lower than expectated and the market has rallied since then, posting fresh 32-month highs each session.

New Zealand's debt markets have also rallied. Interest rates have continued to fall, underpinning equities, despite the Reserve Bank's comment on Wednesday that it saw no scope for a further easing in monetary conditions.
